availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry A. Parish (Hopkins co. , KY, blacksmith)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, blacksmith. North Carolina native. Married to Leanna Parish. Gun stocker in Guilford County, North Carolina, in 1850. Employed Isaac Williams as a gunsmith in Guilford County in 1850. Blacksmith in Hopkins County in 1860. Employed John Wiley as a day laborer in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, North Carolina, Guilford County, Southern Division, p. 275B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 751.
